Issue.creator: sudheesh001
Issue.summary: Build Network documentation has typos in policy specification
Issue.description: install and instantiate chaincode http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.1/build_network.html#install-instantiate-chaincode The text section speaks about the endorsement policy being Org0.MSP, Org1.MSP instead of Org1.MSP, Org2.MSP The golang command however provided is correct and doesn't need a change. The text needs to be changed appropriately. >
